tour-meeting-details: Make your way to the Seahorse Inn Boydtown Park Road, Eden which is located on the shores of beautiful Twofold Bay, 6 km south of the popular tourist port of Eden, on the New South Wales south coast.
Tour Creation: Created By Hannah Charlton via Tour Builder App - 25th Feb 2022
tour-about-this-walk: One of New South Wales best-kept secrets is the amazing Light to Light Walk situated on the Sapphire Coast near Eden in New South Wales. This scenic self-guided 30km walk winds its way from the historic Lighthouse at Boyds Tower to the charming 1883 Lighthouse at Green Cape. This dramatic landscape is a kaleidoscope of contrasts from the striking 320 million years old red rocky outcrops to coastal forests. Far from clinging to the coast, the walk meanders across the invisible boundaries that separate one set of plant habitats from another. As if stepping through a door, heathland gives away to tall open forests. Thick groves of tea tree or paperbark trees emerge into open coastal banksia woodlands or imposing forests of Woolly Butt.
accommodation-description:
Seahorse Boutique Inn

After a day's hiking experience, there's nothing better than returning to wonderful accommodation where you can rest and recharge your batteries. Our accommodation for three nights is in the luxurious Seahorse boutique hotel located on the shores of pretty Twofold Bay commanding stunning views to Eden. This accommodation offers modern luxury with the ambience of old-world charm. Relax and unwind in the Cocktail Lounge before dinner taking in the beautiful views. The accommodation has a choice of king or twin beds.
tour-airport-transfers: When you book your Light to Light walk with us, please select pickups from Merimbula Airport and we will organise the transfer company to collect you from the airport and take you to the Seahorse Inn at Eden.
tour-upgrades: Name: Single Supplement - Light to light, Adjustment: $286
tour-flight-details:
The closest airport is at Merimbula. Rex Airlines offers daily flights to Merimbula from Sydney and Melbourne. Check the airline’s website for details or phone 13 17 13. https://www.rex.com.au


Please note your tour price does not include flights to Merimbula you will need to organise these yourself. Also, due to COVID-19, available flight schedules are subject to change and may not be available. We suggest visiting the airline’s website as a good way to explore what flights are available on your preferred dates.


The Seahorse Inn Eden can collect you from Merimbula Airport and drop you off at the end of your walk. Please let us know if you require this service when you book your Light to Light walk with us and advise us of your flight times so we can organise airport pickups and drop-offs.
tour-pre-post-accommodation: For those wishing to book additional pre or post-tour accommodation nights please contact the Seahorse Inn Eden directly on (02) 6496 1361 or book via their website at: https://www.seahorseinnhotel.com.au/
name: Self-Guided Light to Light 4 Day Walk - 20/03/2022
tour-solo-travellers: Due to safety reason we do not offer self-guided tours to solo travellers and require a minimum of 2 persons to complete the experience.
